name: pnp-list-formatting-faq-format
title: Faq-Format
shortDescription: This is sample creates an FAQ formatted list. Optionally, you can include the Keyword and KeywordLink columns for the [faq-keyword-links-format.json](./faq-keyword-links-format.json) sample.
longDescription: This is sample creates an FAQ formatted list. Optionally, you can include the Keyword and KeywordLink columns for the [faq-keyword-links-format.json](./faq-keyword-links-format.json) sample.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
